text: John Gray McCulloch (15 July 1896 – 1935) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton, Rangers and Airdrieonians. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1935 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Airdrieonians F.C. (1878) players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players Category:Vale of Clyde F.C. players Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Rutherglen
title: John McCulloch (footballer, born 1896)
